       @Nonnull
       char[] message,

        Initializes the message.
        Parameters:
        transport - who is sending to whom.
        message - the message that was sent.
        size - the size of the message

      • Message

        public Message(TransportEnum transport)
        Empty message. Good for indicating if someone has closed the connection.
        Parameters:
        transport - for example TransportEnum.CLIENT_CLOSED_CONNECTION or TransportEnum.SERVER_CLOSED_CONNECTION.
